alert.note: Alert for Leake (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 27 at 7:59PM CDT until August 28 at 4:42PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Yockanookany River Near Ofahoma affecting Leake County. Pearl River near Lena affecting Leake County. Tuscolameta Creek At Walnut Grove affecting Leake County. Pearl River Above Philadelphia affecting Neshoba County. Pearl River Near Ratliff`s Ferry affecting Madison and Rankin Counties. Pearl River Near Carthage affecting Leake County. Pearl River At Edinburg affecting Leake County. For the Upper Pearl River...including Philadelphia, Edinburg, Carthage, Walnut Grove, Lena, Kosciusko, Ratliff`s Ferry, Ofahoma, Jackson...Major flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Yockanookany River Near Ofahoma. * WHEN...Until tomorrow afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:45 PM CDT Saturday the stage was 19.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this evening and continue falling to 11.1 feet Thursday evening. - Flood stage is 19.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Yockanookany River Ofahoma 19.0 19.5 Sat 6 pm CDT 16.8 15.1 13.4 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Sunday morning at 900 AM CDT.
